testsuite.test:
setPreferenceForKey preferenceForKey Verify that get returns what set did
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey preferenceForKey Check for old params order If this test fails the old params order for setPreferenceForKey is implemented
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Verify that return value is undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Set a preference string using all characters from char 1 through char 255 and verify them
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Store 1024 characters
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

openURL Verify that it opens the browser
Instructions: Make sure your device is online. Click the 'GO' button, to open a browser window.
Expected behaviour: Did the browser open?

onFocus Verify that callback is executed
Instructions: 1) Open multiple widgets on your screen. 2) Click 'GO'. 3) Focus this one again.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMaximize Verify that callback is executed
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Minimize this application, to mini mode. 3) Maximize it again, to full screen mode, test should pass (will timeout otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onRestore Verify that callback is executed
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Hide/Minimize this application. 3) Restore it again, test should pass (will timeout otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onWakeup Verify that callback is executed
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Make your phone enter sleep mode. 3) Turn your phone back on, this should make this test pass (will timeout otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
